channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Opera Has Turned 30—and Is Celebrating With a Compelling Tribute to Web Nostalgia
item.description: It certainly wasn't like this in the old days.

item.title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman announces Pentagon deal with ‘technical safeguards’
item.description: OpenAI's CEO claims its new defense contract includes protections addressing the same issues that became a flashpoint for Anthropic.

item.title: TikTok's viral cleaning gadgets are on sale at Walmart — here's everything I'm buying for a spring reset
item.description: I'm rounding up TikTok's viral cleaning gadgets on sale at Walmart from brands like Bissell, Dyson, Hoover, and Shark, starting at just $12.59.

item.title: You can still grab great deals on Bose headphones and Astro Bot this weekend
item.description: Welcome to the weekend, friends! While the rest of our team was checking out Samsung’s forthcoming Galaxy S26 lineup and prepping for Apple’s “special experience” next week, we’ve been sifting through Woot’s “Video Games for All” sale and a truly weird slate of deals that, frankly, don’t have a throughline. (Some of us have also […]

item.title: NASA Is Making Big Changes to Speed Up the Artemis Program
item.description: America’s journey back to the moon has run into a few missteps. NASA administrator Jared Isaacman is banking on a new approach.

item.title: I pitted JBL and UE’s mini Bluetooth speakers against one another, and although they both sound sensational, there was only ever going to be one winner
item.description: Here’s what happened when I pitted JBL and UE’s small-sized Bluetooth speakers against each other.

item.title: Hacked Prayer App Sends ‘Surrender’ Messages to Iranians Amid Israeli and US Strikes
item.description: As Israeli airstrikes hit Tehran this morning, Iranians received mysterious push notifications saying that “help is on the way,” promising amnesty if they surrender.

item.title: Leica’s Leitzphone by Xiaomi has a huge 1-inch camera sensor and a stylish new design
item.description: Alongside a global launch for Xiaomi's 17 Ultra (read about that right here), the company announced a further deepening of its relationship with Leica. The CEO of Leica, Matthias Harsch, took to the stage to announce a new Leitzphone, which appears to be an even deeper collaboration than 17 Ultra by Leica, which is a different phone. Confused? That's fair. Design-wise, Leica has shifted back to a single tone body color, which looks more "Leica" to this camera dilettante's eyes. And if you’re thinking you’ve heard of the Leitzphone before, you probably have: it was a series of phones made by S...

item.title: Paramount’s New ‘G.I. Joe’ Movie Plans Sound Dumb as Hell
item.description: Max Landis and Danny McBride (no, really) are apparently next in line to bring 'GI Joe' back to the big screen. Yay...?

item.title: How to watch NRL 2026: Free Streams, TV Channels, Preview for new season
item.description: As Brisbane Broncos seek to defend their crown after dethroning Penrith, here's how to watch NRL 2026 live streams with TV channels and FREE options explained.

item.title: This Is the System That Intercepted Iran's Missiles Over the UAE
item.description: As Iranian missiles targeted US-linked sites across the Gulf, the UAE’s missile shield was activated in real-time.

item.title: Xiaomi launches 17 Ultra smartphone, an AirTag clone, and an ultra slim powerbank
item.description: We round up everything Xiaomi announced at its Mobile World Congress event.

item.title: Xiaomi Vision GT : tout savoir sur l’hypercar dévoilée au MWC 2026
item.description: Regardez bien cette silhouette. Ce n'est pas le prochain accessoire pour votre salon, c'est la Xiaomi Vision GT. Dévoilée à Barcelone aux côtés de la nouvelle gamme Xiaomi 17, cette bête de course conçue pour Gran Turismo, sur les circuits, réels comme virtuels.

item.title: Test du Xiaomi 17 Ultra : un zoom optique continu, c’est une énorme surprise
item.description: Écran 120 Hz LTPO, processeur Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, batterie de 6000 mAh, charge rapide (avec ou sans fil), et un téléobjectif à double focale avec capteur de 200 mégapixels : le Xiaomi 17 Ultra frappe fort.

item.title: Why China’s humanoid robot industry is winning the early market
item.description: China’s push into humanoid robots is accelerating, with domestic firms shipping more units and iterating faster than U.S. competitors in a still-nascent market.

item.title: The hidden problem with taking five billion photos a day
item.description: Our relationship with photography has changed radically, creating vast dormant datasets.

item.title: I'm a trained barista, and here are my top 15 AeroPress accessories to take your brewing to the next level
item.description: Upgrade your AeroPress with my guide to the best accessories and add-ons, starting at just $10.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Sunday, March 1 (game #1497)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Sunday, March 1 (game #994)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Sunday, March 1 (game #728)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Samsung veut que Galaxy AI soit votre « ami invisible », mais ça veut dire quoi ?
item.description: Le rêve de Samsung est de faire de Galaxy AI une IA proactive capable d'agir comme un ami invisible et bien intentionné à l'intérieur de votre téléphone.

item.title: Xiaomi lance une Hypercar, voici les premières images du bolide
item.description: Après le succès fulgurant de sa berline électrique SU7, Xiaomi accélère dans l’univers automobile. Au MWC 2026, la marque chinoise dévoile la Vision GT, une HyperCar futuriste pensée pour la performance et l’aérodynamisme.

item.title: Le meilleur accessoire de Xiaomi revient dans un format plus petit et en moins cher
item.description: Xiaomi présente la Mijia, le plus petit compresseur d’air électrique jamais créé par la marque. Disponible dès aujourd’hui au prix de 49,99 €. Le Xiaomi Air Compact compressor est là et il pourrait convaincre un paquet de cyclistes et autres propriétaires de trottienttes électriques.

item.title: Xiaomi lance son « AirTag » : le Tag est deux fois moins cher en plus d’être compatible Android et iPhone
item.description: egardez bien ce petit galet de 10 grammes. Le Xiaomi Tag n'est pas juste un clone de plus, c'est une alternative sérieuse qui s'intègre au réseau d'Apple tout en restant ouvert à Google. Xiaomi veut démocratiser le traqueur d'objets, et c'est très bien vu.

item.title: Xiaomi TV S Mini LED 2026 : la nouvelle offensive Mini LED abordable
item.description: Xiaomi lance en France sa série de téléviseurs TV S Mini LED 2026, déclinée de 55 à 98 pouces, avec dalles 4K QD‑Mini LED, compatibilité HDR, Google TV et tarifs agressifs. En voici tous les détails.

item.title: 01lab : l’écran du Xiaomi 17 Ultra bat le record absolu de luminosité
item.description: Le Xiaomi 17 Ultra est passé sur le gril de notre 01Lab. Verdict ? Sa nouvelle dalle OLED HyperRGB explose les compteurs et bouscule la concurrence.

item.title: Xiaomi : 5 nouvelles trottinettes électriques pour envahir (encore) le marché
item.description: Xiaomi présente une nouvelle gamme de trottinettes électriques, la Xiaomi Electric Scooter 6. Cette série comprend cinq modèles, dont un très haut de gamme, deux haut de gamme et deux entrée de gamme.
